languages.text: "Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. Сохраню пустую бутыль — вдруг вы захотите снова посоревноваться в стрельбе".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. Вы были достойн{mf|ым|ой} противни{mf|ком|цей}".

languages.text: "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I'll make sure to keep the empty bottle afterward — in case you want to have another shooting contest."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. Сохраню пустую бутыль — вдруг вы захотите снова посоревноваться в стрельбе".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I'll make sure to keep the empty bottle afterward — in case you want to have another shooting contest."
"Thank you, Rogue Trader. I'll make sure to keep the empty bottle afterward — in case you want to have another shooting contest."
"Thank you, Rogue Trader. I'll make sure to keep the empty bottle afterward — in case you want to have another shooting contest."
"Thank you, Rogue Trader. I'll make sure to keep the empty bottle afterward — in case you want to have another shooting contest."
"Thank you, Rogue Trader. I'll make sure to keep the empty bottle afterward — in case you want to have another shooting contest."

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます、ローグトレーダー。後で空き瓶はちゃんと取っておきますね。またあなたが射撃の勝負をしたくなるかもしれませんから」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I'll make sure to keep the empty bottle afterward — in case you want to have another shooting contest."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとうございます、ローグトレーダー。後で空き瓶はちゃんと取っておきますね。またあなたが射撃の勝負をしたくなるかもしれませんから」

languages.text: "Teşekkürler Hür Tacir. Şişeyi bitirince atmayacağım. Belki bir ara yine atış yarışması yapasımız gelir."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I'll make sure to keep the empty bottle afterward — in case you want to have another shooting contest."

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkürler Hür Tacir. Şişeyi bitirince atmayacağım. Belki bir ara yine atış yarışması yapasımız gelir."

languages.text: «Gracias, Comerciante. Me aseguraré de guardar la botella vacía, por si quisiera repetir la competición».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I'll make sure to keep the empty bottle afterward — in case you want to have another shooting contest."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, Comerciante. Me aseguraré de guardar la botella vacía, por si quisiera repetir la competición».

languages.text: “谢谢你，行商浪人。等酒喝完之后，空酒瓶我会好好留着，说不定你下次还想再比一场。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I'll make sure to keep the empty bottle afterward — in case you want to have another shooting contest."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，行商浪人。等酒喝完之后，空酒瓶我会好好留着，说不定你下次还想再比一场。”

languages.text: « Merci, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je veillerai à conserver la bouteille une fois vide, au cas où vous auriez envie de vous mesurer à nouveau à moi. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I'll make sure to keep the empty bottle afterward — in case you want to have another shooting contest."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je veillerai à conserver la bouteille une fois vide, au cas où vous auriez envie de vous mesurer à nouveau à moi. »

languages.text: "Danke, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich werde die leere Flasche danach behalten ... falls Euch wieder einmal nach einem Wettschießen sein sollte."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I'll make sure to keep the empty bottle afterward — in case you want to have another shooting contest."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich werde die leere Flasche danach behalten ... falls Euch wieder einmal nach einem Wettschießen sein sollte."
